transcript:
and then they fired grapeshot at them. 
Little Tushin, moving feebly and awkward- ly, kept telling his orderly to "refill my pipe for that one!" and then, scattering sparks from it, ran forward shading his eyes with his small hand to look at the French. 
"Smack at 'em, lads!" he kept saying, seizing the guns by the wheels and working the screws himself. 
Amid the smoke, deafened by the incessant reports which always made him jump, Tushin not taking his pipe from his mouth ran from gun to g
